comments: A professor who cares about his students. if you pay attention, try, and communicate with him he will help you. He empathizes well with everyone, and if you miss a class it doesn\'t count against you, but he wants to make sure you are well, as a person, not just a student. He singlehandedly re-instilled my faith in the quality of education at SCSU
Such an interesting class... This guys knows how to teach and makes the room come alive. He is also so helpful. Got to work to get a good grade though.
